howler 0.1.0
  • Reference

Volume Slider

Source: R/slider.R
howlerVolumeSlider.Rd

A more user friendly way to adjust the volume of the howlerPlayer than by using buttons. There are still volume up/down buttons, but a slider can be moved up/down as required.

howlerVolumeSlider(id, volume = 0.7)

Arguments

id

ID given to the volume slider. For it to work with the howlerPlayer, the ID must match that of the howlerPlayer.
volume

Initial volume to set the player at. Defaults at 70%

Value

A volume slider with a howlerVolumeDownButton and a howlerVolumeUpButton either side.

Details

If using howlerVolumeSlider, avoid using the volume buttons, as this will cause duplicate IDs to appear in the shiny application and prevents the slider from working properly.

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  library(shiny)

  ui <- fluidPage(
    title = "howler.js Player",
    useHowlerJS(),
    howlerPlayer("sound", "audio/sound.mp3"),
    howlerPlayPauseButton("sound"),
    howlerVolumeSlider("sound")
  )

  server <- function(input, output, session) {
  }

  shinyApp(ui, server)
}
